title: Customer Resets Online Account Password
description: A customer has forgotten the password for their online account and uses the website's self-service tool to reset it.

tasks.description: Click the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is taken to the password reset page.

tasks.description: Enter their email address associated with the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer provides their email to identify their account.

tasks.description: The system sends a password reset link to their email. The customer clicks the link and creates a new password.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer successfully regains access to their account.
